summary: A utility which allows the player to banish the Katariah after the completion of the Dark Brotherhood questline.
descriptionHtml:
A utility which allows the player to banish the Katariah after the completion of the Dark Brotherhood questline. Instructions are as follows:
[list]
[b][*] Make sure you have retrieved EVERYTHING you wish to keep from the interior of the Katariah. Anything you leave behind will become inaccessible after sending the ship away.

[*] Complete "Hail Sithis!" by reporting to Nazir at the Dawnstar Sanctuary.

[*] Return to the Katariah, go up on the deck, and activate the ship's wheel. Choose "Yes" when the message box pops up.

[*] You will be fast-traveled to Solitude, and the Katariah will disappear.[/b]
[/list]
author: Kingston3K
